short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to schedule VANI Meetings inside your Calendar with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install this extension to add VANI meeting button to your calendar as well as chrome toolbar. A meeting room will be automatically created and added to the invite.
